Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a wealth of features and benefits that I believe will greatly enhance your experience. Given its quality and functionality, I propose a price of $150 for it. I trust this offer will be attractive enough to consider, as it reflects the true value of what we have to offer. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
